channel.title: Problems with prayer! ASAP!
channel.description:
i have this code for it. [code=cmf]public void prayerMessage(int exp, int delete) { setAnimation(827); addSkillXP(exp*getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]), 5); sM("You bury the bones."); deleteItem(delete, getItemSlot(delete), 1);[/code]
how do i change it so i actualy get as much exp as i set for the bone to give?
i know i have to change this [code=cmf]addSkillXP(exp*getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]), 5);[/code]
to something like [code=cmf]addSkillXP(exp*getLevelForXP, 5);[/code] this one or whatever , i just dunno the right code
can anyone help?
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
and why when i kill npc , and when i start attacking other npc right away , and my killed npc dissapears , my char stops attacking that other npc. how can i make it so it wouldn't stop?

item.title: Problems with prayer! ASAP!
item.dc:creator: @Christiaan Christiaan
item.description:
@Christiaan wrote:

[code] public void prayerMessage(int exp, int delete) {
if(ItemID == 536){
deleteItem(536, 1);
addSkillXP(1500, 5);
sM(“You receive some prayer experience.”);
setAnimation(894);

if(ItemID == other bonesID){
deleteItem(other bonesID, 1);
addSkillXP(exp for other bonesid, 5);
sM(“You receive some prayer experience.”);
setAnimation(894);

if(ItemID == other bonesID){
deleteItem(other bonesID, 1);
addSkillXP(exp for other bonesid, 5);
sM(“You receive some prayer experience.”);
setAnimation(894);

}
[/code]

like that?

Read full topic

item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

yes well this works

addSkillXP(1500, 5);

i’ve done this my self

but this is only for dragon bones , what about big bones and normal bones? they give 1,5k xp as well , not good.

item.title: Problems with prayer! ASAP!
item.dc:creator: @Christiaan Christiaan
item.description:
@Christiaan wrote:

Watch my first reply, if i understand it, it isnt using the code you thaught it would use…
And im not a dumbass tbh.
Try what i said in my first reply.

addSkillXP(1500, 5);
that is what you have in there, if it would read it, you would gain that xp anyways.

i g2g now, maybe someone else could read this and my replies…

Read full topic

item.title: Problems with prayer! ASAP!
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

ok , lemme explain it to you one more time.

THIS

public void prayerMessage(int exp, int delete) { setAnimation(827); addSkillXP(exp*getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]), 5); sM("You bury the bones."); deleteItem(delete, getItemSlot(delete), 1);
is my PRAYER void.

this

addSkillXP(exp*getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]), 5);

means that the higher my PRAYER LVL is , the more PRAYER XP i get.

i get 80 xp per dragon bone , even though i set it to give me 1,5k

once i reach like 70 it gives me more than 4k and so on so on.

but i dont want that.

i want to get as many PRAY XP points as i set my bones to give me. ( which is 1,5k per d bone )

if you dont get what i’m telling you now , sorry dude but u have to be one hell of a dumbass.
SORRY IF I OFFENDED YOU THOUGH.

Read full topic

i’ve set my d bones to give me 1,5k

if(ItemID == 536){ deleteItem(536, 1); addSkillXP(1500, 5); sM("You receive some prayer experience."); setAnimation(894);

and i still get this for my xp !!!
